name: SDO_DAS_XML.loadString
purpose: Returns SDO_DAS_XML_Document for a given xml instance string

return.description:
Returns SDO_DAS_XML_Document object on Success 
   or throws exception as described.

errors:
SDO_TypeNotFoundException
     
     
      
       Thrown if a type is not defined by the underlying model.SDO_PropertyNotFoundException
     
     
      
       Thrown if the a property within a type is not defined 
       in the underlying model.SDO_DAS_XML_ParserException
     
     
      
       Thrown for any problems while parsing the given XSD File.
